![Jason Arnold - City Manager](https://www.cityofdiboll.com/vertical/Sites/%7B1944FF6B-535F-46A1-911D-F35358C2ECA6%7D/uploads/Jason_A_Arnold_Web.jpg)

Jason Arnold - City Manager

City Manager
============

Jason A. Arnold became Diboll's City Manager on November 01, 2021.  Arnold is responsible for implementing the Mayor and City Council's policies, as well as managing the City's budget and staff.

The new City Manager's prior experience includes time with the City of College Station, the City of Harker Heights, and the City of Lufkin.  Most recently Arnold served as the Assistant City Manager of the City of Lufkin.

Arnold received his undergraduate degree from Texas A&M University and his Master's in Public Administration from Stephen F. Austin State University.

Arnold married his wife Felicia in 2007 and they have three children:  Ariana, Noah, and Landry.
